page.title: 18Credits.
page.content:
St.Thomas More Roman Catholic Primary School in Peterborough wishes to thank the people in the Newborough area who helped the Domesday project by assisting with and completing questionnaires. In particular we wish to thank the members of the Newborough and Borough Fen Women's Institute and farmer Nick Harris.
We thank all the children in classes 11,12,13,and 14 who helped with the project.In particular we thank Ian Foster,Graeme Mutton,Lorna Brien,Anthony Ryan,Cara Gissane,Katie McKeogh,Shaun Baruzi,Chantal Mason, June Friel,Reshma Virji,Fraser Lumley, Amy Barham,Paul Crescente,Alice Grix, Caroline Hannon,Martin Rafferty, Rebecca Patterson and Rowena Pearson.
